author: kondratyevd
body:
This is a backport for https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37437. 
The backport is needed to integrate the OI seeding upgrade into the V2 HLT menu.
There are no changes to the code w.r.t. original PR.

@missirol
title: [Backport 12_3_X] Update to DNN-based strategy for outside-in seed generation in Muon HLT
